Articles.Content:
2 hours ago, AlamoVampire said:

Floor 4768: 7-G

150804262024

Floor 4769: A room with a Combine Gunship undergoing repairs. You go to the next floor before the guards notice you.

Floor 4770: a sign saying: Floor 4770

183204262024

new page

Floor 4771: a sign with the stroken out caption "Floor 4770"

Spoiler

Floor 4772: a floor with kittens playing and purring sweetly.

015004272024

Floor 4773: A museum cataloging all three Number Wars, including ones that didn't last long since there were already ones that were ongoing. Museum staff rush to update the Third Number War exhibit with new artifacts.

Floor 4774: palindromes 

000504282024
Floor 4775: A control room with other rooms that simulate the conditions on other planets.
Floor 4776: A caption on the wall: "Be careful! Next floor is for three seven."

Floor 4777: a single vanilla orchid

150504282024
Floor 4778: A caption on the wall "You failed to notice three seven."

Floor 4779: a sign reading: three 777 was 1 thousand floors or so back, saw it then no need now. Ban.

010404292024
Floor 4780: A gallery of dead memes. You admire them and press an F key to pay respect to Pepe, then move on to the next floor.

Floor 4781: a floor where no meme has ever existed. Its a utopia.

134104292024
Floor 4782: a room with a sign saying "That was made by a meme hater". You honestly don't care and move on.
Floor 4783: A Library containing every SciFi paperback ever written.
Floor 4784: A CD full of them which I had unexpectedly bought years ago.

Floor 4785: A very large warehouse, with many rooms, and a sign that says "BA's Warehouse." You enter the doors.

Inside, you pass many rooms, such as an art room, an aircraft hangar, a kitchen, and a gaming room.

You finally come across a room with wargaming miniatures and boxes everywhere, with so many boxes stacked up and organized in such a way that it becomes a maze. You enter the maze, and in the center, you meet me. "Hey there! I can't believe that you managed to find me! I'm working on an army right now. Want to see?"

I point towards a set of tables in front of me, and you see a 1:100 scale replica of the United States Army, complete with tanks, helicopters, infantry fighting vehicles, artillery, and other types of vehicles that the US Army uses, along with 3 squadrons of CAS planes and enough infantry to add up to 1.4 million troops on the tables. Nearby is a Separatist Droid Army from Star Wars, a 1:100 scale Russian army, and an Imperial Guard army, among other things.

After seeing all of these miniatures, you tell me that you are impressed by this and then tell me to get some sleep. I oblige, and fall asleep on the spot. You decide to leave the warehouse and move on.

Floor 4786: this is a floor. It is not special. Have a glass of milk.

132204302024
Floor 4787: Clanka
Floor 4787-a: A very short, in-between floor, containing a portal into John Malkovich's mind.

Floor 4789: a sign correctly identifying the prior floor as 4788, this floor as 4789 and the next floor as 4790.

135204302024
Floor 4790: A 1:1 replica of the universe, but with Newtonian gravity.

floor 4791: a word with nearly 190,000 letters.

002505012024

(i redid this for fear of server health. Titin chemical name)

Floor 4792: The brief name from the floor 4791 is cut by the word filter, so we will never know what chemical compound was meant.

Floor 4793: A lovely Bed and Breakfast. You stay and relax for a week.
